FuncDef: This command configures the LSP MTU size. If thesizevalue is changed from the default using CLI or SNMP, then IS-IS must be restarted in order for the change to take effect. This can be done by performing ashutdowncommand and then ano shutdowncommand in theconfig>router>isiscontext.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the LSP MTU size. Values-490 to 9190.
